# microsoft-azure-cloud-icons Reference

This directory contains 19 icons extracted from `microsoft-azure-cloud-icons.excalidrawlib`.

## Available Icons

| Icon Name                   | Filename                                 |
| --------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| Analysis Services           | `icons/Analysis-Services.json`           |
| Azure Cache for Redis       | `icons/Azure-Cache-for-Redis.json`       |
| Azure Cosmos DB             | `icons/Azure-Cosmos-DB.json`             |
| Azure Data Explorer         | `icons/Azure-Data-Explorer.json`         |
| Azure Data Factory          | `icons/Azure-Data-Factory.json`          |
| Azure Database for MariaDB  | `icons/Azure-Database-for-MariaDB.json`  |
| Azure Database for MySQL    | `icons/Azure-Database-for-MySQL.json`    |
| Azure Database for Postgres | `icons/Azure-Database-for-Postgres.json` |
| Azure Databricks            | `icons/Azure-Databricks.json`            |
| Azure Event Hubs            | `icons/Azure-Event-Hubs.json`            |
| Azure Machine Learning      | `icons/Azure-Machine-Learning.json`      |
| Azure Policy                | `icons/Azure-Policy.json`                |
| Azure SQL Database          | `icons/Azure-SQL-Database.json`          |
| Azure SQLMI                 | `icons/Azure-SQLMI.json`                 |
| Azure Synapse Analytics     | `icons/Azure-Synapse-Analytics.json`     |
| Cognitive Services          | `icons/Cognitive-Services.json`          |
| Cost Management and billig  | `icons/Cost-Management-and-billig.json`  |
| Power BI                    | `icons/Power-BI.json`                    |
| SQL Server on Azure VM      | `icons/SQL-Server-on-Azure-VM.json`      |

## Usage

Each icon JSON file contains the complete `elements` array needed to render that icon in Excalidraw.
You can copy the elements from these files into your Excalidraw diagrams.
